Scorer - Class in de.ur.iw.navigame.game_logic
The Scorer takes the path data for a session and its start and goal and calculates a score for the path.

sendErrorToClient(HttpServletResponse, IOException) - Method in class de.ur.iw.navigame.sessions.SessionCreation
Sends an internal server error to the client.
sendSessionInfoToClient(HttpServletResponse, JSONObject[]) - Method in class de.ur.iw.navigame.sessions.SessionCreation
Creates a unique ID and sends that + data for two rooms to the client, as JSON.
sendSessionNotFoundError(HttpServletResponse) - Method in class de.ur.iw.navigame.sessions.SessionStorage
Sends a {status: "session_404"} response to the client.
ServletRequestHandler - Interface in de.ur.iw.navigame.utility
Can write output to a HttpServletResponse, based on params provided to a HttpServletRequest
SessionCreation - Class in de.ur.iw.navigame.sessions
The SessionCreation initiates a new session of the game by creating a unique ID and selecting two rooms, one of which will be the start and the other one of which will be the goal of the path.
SessionCreation() - Constructor for class de.ur.iw.navigame.sessions.SessionCreation
 
SessionStorage - Class in de.ur.iw.navigame.sessions
The SessionStorage can save and load sessions.
SessionStorage() - Constructor for class de.ur.iw.navigame.sessions.SessionStorage
 
setServletContext(ServletContext) - Static method in class de.ur.iw.navigame.utility.FileStorage
In order to get the local file path of the application (where the "war" is located) this class needs a reference to the ServletContext.
